  • 方法详细资料

    • register

      public void register​(String store, String key, KeyInformation information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: IndexProvider
      This method registers a new key for the specified index store with the given data type. This allows the IndexProvider to prepare the index if necessary. It is expected that this method is first called with each new key to inform the index of the expected type before the key is used in any documents.
      指定者:
      register 在接口中 IndexProvider
      参数:
      store - Index store
      key - New key to register
      information - Information on the key to register
      tx - enclosing transaction
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • mutate

      public void mutate​(Map<String,​Map<String,​IndexMutation>> mutations, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: IndexProvider
      Mutates the index (adds and removes fields or entire documents)
      指定者:
      mutate 在接口中 IndexProvider
      参数:
      mutations - Updates to the index. First map contains all the mutations for each store. The inner map contains all changes for each document in an IndexMutation.
      information - Information on the keys used in the mutation accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      抛出:
      BackendException
      另请参阅:
      IndexMutation

    • restore

      public void restore​(Map<String,​Map<String,​List<IndexEntry>>> documents, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: IndexProvider
      Restores the index to the state of the primary data store as given in the documents variable. When this method returns, the index records for the given documents exactly matches the provided data. Unlike IndexProvider.mutate(java.util.Map, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever, BaseTransaction) this method does not do a delta-update, but entirely replaces the documents with the provided data or deletes them if the document content is empty.
      指定者:
      restore 在接口中 IndexProvider
      参数:
      documents - The outer map maps stores to documents, the inner contains the documents mapping document ids to the document content which is a list of IndexEntry. If that list is empty, that means this document should not exist and ought to be deleted.
      information - Information on the keys used in the mutation accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • queryCount

      public Long queryCount​(IndexQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      指定者:
      queryCount 在接口中 IndexProvider
      抛出:

      public Stream<String> query​(IndexQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: IndexProvider
      Executes the given query against the index.
      指定者:
      query 在接口中 IndexProvider
      参数:
      query - Query to execute
      information - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      返回:
      The ids of all matching documents
      抛出:
      BackendException
      另请参阅:
      IndexQuery

    • query

      public Stream<RawQuery.Result<String>> query​(RawQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException

      Executes the given raw query against the index
      指定者:
      query 在接口中 IndexProvider
      参数:
      query - Query to execute
      information - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      返回:
      Results objects for all matching documents (i.e. document id and score)
      抛出:
      BackendException
      另请参阅:
      RawQuery

      public Long totals​(RawQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever information, BaseTransaction tx) throws BackendException

      参数:

      information - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
      tx - Enclosing transaction
      返回:

      抛出:

    • mapKey2Field

      public String mapKey2Field​(String key, KeyInformation information)
      从接口复制的说明: IndexInformation
      Adjusts the name of the key so that it is a valid field name that can be used in the index. JanusGraph stores this information and will use the returned name in all interactions with the index.

      Note, that mapped field names (either configured on a per key basis or through a global configuration) are not adjusted and handed to the index verbatim.

      指定者:
      mapKey2Field 在接口中 IndexInformation
      返回:

    • getFeatures

      public IndexFeatures getFeatures()
      从接口复制的说明: IndexInformation
      The features of this index
      指定者:
      getFeatures 在接口中 IndexInformation
      返回:
